column2: I am growing older and have no heir, maybe it is time I acknowledge one of my illegitimate children...
column3: Je vieillis et je n'ai pas d'héritier, peut-être qu'il est temps que je reconnaisse l'un de mes enfants illégitimes ...
column4: I am growing older and have no heir, maybe it is time I acknowledge one of my illegitimate children...
column6: I am growing older and have no heir, maybe it is time I acknowledge one of my illegitimate children...

column2: No, there is still time to get a legitimate heir.
column3: Non, j'ai encore le temps d'avoir un héritier légitime.
column4: No, there is still time to get a legitimate heir.
column6: No, there is still time to get a legitimate heir.

column2: In the Jewish tradition, anyone with a Jewish mother is in turn recognised as a Jew. Shall I adopt the religion of my people?
column3: Dans la tradition juive, toute personne ayant une mère juive est à son tour reconnue comme juive. Dois-je adopter la religion de mon peuple ?
column4: In the Jewish tradition, anyone with a Jewish mother is in turn recognised as a Jew. Shall I adopt the religion of my people?
column6: In the Jewish tradition, anyone with a Jewish mother is in turn recognised as a Jew. Shall I adopt the religion of my people?

column2: Sh'ma Yisrael Adonai Eloheinu Adonai Echad
column3: Sh'ma Yisrael Adonai Eloheinu Adonai Echad
column4: Sh'ma Yisrael Adonai Eloheinu Adonai Echad
column6: Sh'ma Yisrael Adonai Eloheinu Adonai Echad

column3: Je ne suis pas un Juif !

column2: Although I belong to a culture traditionally associated with Judaism, I follow a different religion. Should I not openly accept that I am Jewish?
column3: Bien que j'appartienne à une culture traditionnellement associée au judaïsme, je suis une religion différente. Ne dois-je pas accepter ouvertement que je suis juif ?
column4: Although I belong to a culture traditionally associated with Judaism, I follow a different religion. Should I not openly accept that I am Jewish?
column6: Although I belong to a culture traditionally associated with Judaism, I follow a different religion. Should I not openly accept that I am Jewish?

column2: We can hand out some minor titles to vassals
column3: Nous pouvons distribuer des titres mineurs à des vassaux
column4: We can hand out some minor titles to vassals
column6: We can hand out some minor titles to vassals

column2: I have been ill for a long time, and the disease is getting worse
column3: J'ai été malade pendant longtemps et la maladie s'aggrave
column4: I have been ill for a long time, and the disease is getting worse
column6: I have been ill for a long time, and the disease is getting worse

column2: As Exilarch, I cannot be responsible for both the mainstream Jewish as well as Karaite Jewish lines at once. It is best if I hand out the Karaite title to a family member.
column3: En tant qu'exilarque, je ne peux pas être responsable à la fois des lignes juives conventionnelles et juives karaïtes à la fois. Il vaut mieux que je distribue le titre karaïte à un membre de ma famille.
